Operational Configuration

-------------------------

The root directory the scanner is allowed to access (Sandbox)

CONTROL_HUB_SCAN_ROOT=./sandbox_data

The path to the SQLite database (WAL mode enabled automatically)

CONTROL_HUB_DB_PATH=./control_hub_snapshots.db

Monitoring Intervals (Seconds)

MONITOR_INTERVAL_SEC=1
SCANNER_INTERVAL_SEC=15
